revised_title: Analysis of Magnetic Phenomena at Kew Observatory from 1859 to 1864
tldr: This paper presents an analysis of magnetic phenomena at the Kew Observatory from 1859 to 1864, focusing on the horizontal and vertical force magnetometers. The study reveals that 1859 was a year of maximum disturbance, while 1863 and 1864 were years of minimum disturbance. The findings show a correlation with the decennial variation in solar spots.
